name: IPA
description: An American style IPA brewed with traditional west coast hops. Munich 10L makes up 11% of the grist giving this well balanced IPA a malty backbone without being overly sweet.
image_alt: An IPA style beer in a glass on a wooden table.

name: Robust Porter
description: A stronger, more bitter version of a traditional porter. This Robust Porter has a noticeable burnt toasty bitterness that stands out due to a liberal dose of black patent malt. This helps in balancing the perceived bitterness of the aggressive hopping that is consistent with the style. Dry hopped with cascade hops for aromatic complexities.
image_alt: A porter style beer in a glass on a wooden table.

name: Victory Lap Amber Ale
description: Woody, nutty, biscuit flavors dominate this well balanced American amber ale. The use of Victory malt gives this beer a malty complexity while allowing a slight hop presence to shine through.
image_alt: An amber style beer in a glass on a wooden table.

name: Kolsch Rules Everything Around Me
description: German Hallertau hops coupled with yeast cultured from Inland Island, a Colorado company, lead to this unique Kölsch. Crisp, clean, with a fruity aroma all balance to create this easy drinking Kölsch.
image_alt: A kolsch style beer in a glass on a wooden table.

name: Kyky SMASH Pale Ale
description: SMASH (single malt and single hop) Pale Ale. Brewed exclusively with Maris Otter malt and Cascade hops to showcase the characteristics of each ingredient. Hazy light orange, biscuit, nutty, floral, citrus, light grapefruit. A very mild, easy drinking pale ale with a slightly dry finish.
